option.name: apache2template
option.defaultvalue:
<VirtualHost $ipAddress:$port> ServerName $domainname #if $wwwServerAlias ServerAlias www.$domainname #end if
#if $isWildcardDomain ServerAlias *.$domainname #end if
ServerAdmin webmaster@$domainname
SuexecUserGroup $username $username
DocumentRoot "$documentroot"
Alias /webalizer "$HOMEDIR_PREFIX/$username/webalizer/$domainname"
ErrorLog "$LOGPATH/$username/$domainname-error.log" CustomLog "$LOGPATH/$username/$domainname-access.log" combined
#if $isSSL <IfModule mod_ssl.c> SSLEngine on SSLCipherSuite ALL:!ADH:!EXP56:RC4+RSA:+HIGH:+MEDIUM:+LOW:+SSLv2:+EXP:+eNULL SSLCertificateFile $sslCertFile SSLCertificateKeyFile $sslCertKeyFile SSLCertificateChainFile $sslCertChainFile
<Files ~ "\.(cgi|shtml)$"> SSLOptions +StdEnvVars </Files>
SetEnvIf User-Agent ".*MSIE.*" nokeepalive ssl_unclean-shutdown </IfModule> #end if </VirtualHost>
